name: NewsQuizfromTRTWorld
0:
”Alexa, start the TRT World Quiz”
”Alexa, open TRT World Quiz”
”Alexa, launch the TRT World Quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. r. t. world quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des: Each week, TRT World will bring you 3 questions about the stories making headlines during the week. We'll ask you a question, and you simply speak the number of the correct answer. Play the quiz and discover how well you follow the stories we're covering at TRT World.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
